summary: Tons of new craftables to make in the forge out of ancient Ayleid ingots. The ingots will morph into any object when combined with the forge. They can be bought from stores and also found throuout your adventures.
descriptionHtml:
Darring\'s Ayleid Mod
Auther:DarringB
Version:03

Tons of new craftables to make in the forge out of ancient Ayleid ingots. The ingots will morph into any object when combined with the forge. They can be bought from stores and also found throuout your adventures. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

LOCATIONS: AT THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE ARE SPOILER LOCATIONS
Whiterun, Belethors General Goods
Whiterun, Warmaidens
Solitude, Blacksmith
All containers that were marked as \"empty\" now have a 20% chance to spawn Ayleid ingots
All bandit containers now have a 20% chance to spawn Ayleid ingots

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Items that can be made SO FAR:

COMMON:
Iron Weapons and Armor
Steel Weapons and Armor
Fur Weapons and Armor
Daedric Weapons and Armor
Ebony Weapons and Armor
Dragonplate Armor
Dragonscale Armor
Ancient Nord Armor
Glass Weapons and Armor
Elven Armor

UNIQUE:
Arm Bandages
Jagged Crown
Archmage Robes and boots
Blades Armor
Steel Mask

SOUL GEMS:
Black Soul Gem

MISC:
All Ingots

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

SPOILER LOCATIONS:
Whiterun, Breezehome (Upstairs) (3)
Solitude, Sawmill (Upstairs) (7)
Solitude, Stables (Under Stairs) (6)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

No other modder may add to and/or publish this mod.
author: DarringB
